name: Friendship on the Golden Horizon
description:
Created for the luxe jam #1 using the Luxe engine. Check out the other entries! The main jam theme of 'plants x technology' is represented by the harvester, with the Pico-8 palette being used for simplicity! Please expect jam-game quality! :)

Controls
  • 'J' to start and advance the text.
  • 'A' and 'D' to move left and right.
  • Space to fly.
  • 'J' to caw.
  • 'K' to peck.
Credits

The following freesound resources were used in the creation of this game:

  • https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/172969/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Halleck/sounds/121657/
  • https://freesound.org/people/silencyo/sounds/81721/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Erdie/sounds/34372/
  • https://freesound.org/people/TRP/sounds/616859/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Jofae/sounds/387083/
  • https://freesound.org/people/CamoMano/sounds/431019/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Ambientsoundapp/sounds/537988/

Font used is 'Love Bug' by Chevy Ray.
